Title: The Sea Purple
Writer: Giacomo Pilati (novel), Donatella Maiorca (screenplay), Pina Mandolfo (screenplay), Mario Cristiani (screenplay), Donatella Diamanti (screenplay), Giacomo Pilati (dialogue supervisor)
Actors: Valeria Solarino, Isabella Ragonese, Ennio Fantastichini, Giselda Volodi
Plot: Nothing - not her father, not the church - can stop unruly Angela from being with her childhood best friend turned great love, Sara. Based on a true story, Viola di mare, presents a uniquely engaging portrait of family, community and gender roles in a 19th century Italian village.
